document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2019-10
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING TITLE 19 OF THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO REINSTATE INCLUSIONARY HOUSING REQUIREMENTS FOR PROJECTS .CONTAINING FIVE OR MORE RENTAL DWELLING UNITS AND INCREASE THE AFFORDABILITY TERM FROM 40 YEARS TO 55 YEARS FOR RENTAL AND OWNERSHIP RESIDENTIAL PROJECTS
